messages.title: THIS ELECTION ISN’T ABOUT THE NEXT 5 YEARS – IT’S ABOUT THE NEXT 50 YEARS
messages.content: The Green Party is offering real opposition to the Government's extreme Brexit. We have the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country – and our place in the world. The Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An economy that works for all

mentions.candidate: Richard lives in West Bridgford where he is borough councillor for Lady Bay.

issues.brexitEurope: Real opposition to the Government's extreme Brexit.
issues.economy: An economy that works for all.
issues.environment: Committed to preserving and protecting the environment on which we all depend.
issues.governance: To put power back in your hands through a citizen's democracy.

housing.content: Secure, affordable housing. People want to keep our NHS as a free public service, have the best care for the elderly, and need homes and jobs to keep our communities alive.

leaflet.personalStatement: "People across Rushcliffe are concerned about the government's reckless approach to Brexit, unending cuts to our public services and failure to deliver on housing and healthcare. People want to keep our NHS as a free public service, have the best care for the elderly, and need homes and jobs to keep our communities alive."

contactInformation.address: 12 Melton Road, West Bridgford, Nottingham NG2 7NA

images.caption: A photo of Richard Mallender, the Green Party candidate for Rushcliffe.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Election communication leaflet promoting Richard Mallender as the Green Party candidate for Rushcliffe. His stance on various policies such as environment, economy, healthcare, and education are highlighted, along with a personal statement about local concerns regarding Brexit, public service cuts, housing, and healthcare.
